name: Hot Toddy
description: The toddy is engagingly flexible: While most people prefer theirs with a good dose of Scotch (this is one of the few mixed drinks where a single-malt is not only appropriate but desirable), a nice Irish whiskey works well; bourbon and rye can also do a suitable job, and a toddy made with a good dark rum has a special kind of appeal.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces Scotch whisky (or Irish, or other spirit of choice)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse a heavy mug with boiling water, then add sugar. Add water and stir until sugar is dissolved, then add whisky or your chosen spirit.
